transactionComplete.title: Transaction Complete!
transactionComplete.body: Your transaction at block {block} has been completed.

confirmation.clear: Resetting wallet will permanently remove all data (including mnemonics and passwords) from your device, make sure that wallet mnemonics have been backed up. Are you sure to reset?

create.tip1: Welcome! The following words are used for your wallet backup. Without them, you will lose access to your wallet, keep them safe! Write down each word along with the order number next to them. (Order is important)
create.tip2: WARNING: NEVER DISCLOSE YOUR MNEMONIC WORDS. ANYONE WITH THIS MNEMONIC CAN TAKE YOUR XCH FOREVER!

import12.title: Import Pawket Mnemonic Words
import12.tip: Please enter your Pawket Mnemonic Words in order, using spaces between mnemonics.

import24.title: Import Chia Official Mnemonic Words
import24.tip: Please enter your Chia official Mnemonic Words in order, using spaces between mnemonics.

error.wrongSeed: Import failed, please check your Mnemonic Words.
error.notInBip39: {wordList} is (are) not present in the BIP39 word list

notification.donate: You are donating to the developers.
notification.observeMode: Interaction function disabled in Observe Mode
notification.test: Note: kitten.pawket.app is a test site where you can experience some unreleased new features.

alert.passwordChanged: Password has been changed. Please Re-Login.

tooltip.receiveAddress: You can check the balance on more addresses if you increase the value, but the wallet will run slower.

summary.notification:
Are you sure to send?

error.UNKNOWN_UNSPENT: An unknown UTXO has been used, maybe the previous transaction has not been confirmed on the blockchain.
error.INVALID_FEE_TOO_CLOSE_TO_ZERO: Invalid Fee, too Close to Zero

error.PENDING: Transaction already in pending status, please wait for complete.

error.NotAllowedError: ERROR: You need to grant camera access permission.
error.NotFoundError: ERROR: No camera on this device.
error.NotReadableError: ERROR: Is the camera already in use?
error.OverconstrainedError: ERROR: Installed camera is not suitable.
error.StreamApiNotSupportedError: ERROR: Stream API is not supported in this browser.
error.InsecureContextError: ERROR: Camera access is only permitted in secure context. Use HTTPS or localhost rather than HTTP.

about.title: About
about.description: Privacy Policy, Pawket Version, Contact Us

message.clear: Resetting wallet will permanently remove all data (including Mnemonic Words and passwords) from your device, make sure that wallet Mnemonic Words have been backed up. Are you sure to reset?
message.backupConfirm: This operation will export the wallet backup information (including Mnemonic Words and Public Key), which can be used to restore the wallet on other devices.

advanced.title: Advanced

confirmation.experimental: Experimental features are not stable and not fully tested yet, you can have a try and give us your feedback.

advanced.description: After enabling this mode, you can use experimental functions, such as "Make Offer", "Take Offer", "Batch Send", "Issue CAT", "Shadow Wallet", etc.
advanced.warning: Experimental features are not stable and not fully tested yet, you can have a try and give us your feedback. Please turn it on carefully.

about.title: About
about.thanks: Special thanks to Ultimate Farmers Club and hezuoshe.xch

tooltip.addBySerial: Derived serial accounts are created in order.
tooltip.addByPassword: Account protected by MNEMONIC and PASSPHRASE. Enter the same PASSPHRASE to access the same account.
tooltip.addByAddress: Read-only is supported in this mode.
tooltip.addByPublicKey: Add the public key of the offline wallet to help to initiate and complete transactions.

ui.slogan: Pawket is and will continue to be your good companion in the Chia world.

ui.title: Disclaimer
ui.tip: Make sure to always backup your Mnemonic Words and private keys. We will never ask you to share your Mnemonic Words or private keys. NEVER trust anyone or any site that asks you to enter your Mnemonic Words or private keys.
ui.privary: We may change the Privacy Policy from time to time. We encourage you to periodically review it for the latest information on our Privacy Policy. If we make any changes to the Privacy Policy, we will change its Last Updated date.

createPassword.title: Create Password
createPassword.tip: Before starting, please set a login password. This password will be used to keep your wallet safe on this device.

tooltip.mnemonic12Tip: Only a reference, not compatible with Chia official wallet

message.disconnect: Are you sure to disconnect [{acc}] from this site?

addDid.title: Add DID
addDid.tip: You will use 1 mojo to create a DID.
addDid.confirmation:
Are you sure to create a DID?
Please review your transaction.

ui.title: Transfer
ui.description: You will transfer this NFT to a new owner.

summary.confirmation:
Are you sure to transfer the NFT?
Please review your transaction.

myCollection.title: My Collection
myCollection.specialNote: Special Note: Collection information will not be uploaded to the blockchain, and the data will be stored in your local device. After changing the device, the Collection will not be synchronized to the account.

confirmation.delete: Are you sure to remove the Collection?

prompt.selectAssetType: By scanning more addresses, you can discover assets not shown in the list (including XCH, CAT, NFT etc.) and transfer them to a commonly used address.
prompt.wait: Please be patient for a few minutes.

confirmation.close: Scanning has not completed. Are you sure to close this page?
confirmation.cancel: Scanning has not been completed. Are you sure to cancel?

error.ABORT_OOM: Scanning was aborted. Please refresh the page and try again.
error.NETWORK_ERROR: Network Error. Please try again later.
error.UNKNOWN: Unknown Error. Please try again later.

ui.title: Sign Message
ui.prompt: Make sure the message comes from trusty source. If you don't understand or agree to the message, don't sign!

ui.warning: A malicious network provider can lie about the state of the blockchain and record your network activity. Only add custom networks you trust.

confirmation.delete: Are you sure to remove this network?

ui.title: Buy USDS
ui.tip: Currently only supports buying USDS on the Chia blockchain via ACH bank transfer.

nftBurn.title: NFT burn
nftBurn.description: You will burn this NFT by removing it from circulation by sending it to a verifiably unspendable address.
nftBurn.confirmation:
Are you sure to burn this NFT? If you burn this NFT, nobody (including you) will ever be able to access it again.
Please review your transaction.

cns.title: Chia Name Service
cns.placeholder: Search for a Chia Domain Name

message.notOpen: During the trial operation period of CNS, only names with 6 or more characters can be registered for the time being. In the future, the registration of all names will be gradually opened. Stay tuned!
message.registered: This name has been registered. Go to view
message.unavailable: This name is reserved. If you can prove that you are the owner of the name/trademark/brand, please contact us via Twitter/Discord.
message.noName: No Chia Domain Name Here. Search to Get One.

label.selectAccount: Select an account to use on this site
label.viewInfo: View your account addresses, balance, DIDs and activities.
label.noWalletInfo: You do not have a wallet set up in Pawket.
